reviews.text: after being stuck on an airplane for about 6 hrs, we arrived in miami about 530 in the morning. walk into the hotel and the lady at the front desk was extremely rude and not helpful. the smell inside was horrible like mold and urine and there was 2 buckets at the front desk catchin water coming from the ceiling. as you go up to your room, the hallways are nasty, garbage piled everywhere and the ceilings had mold on them. the room air conditioning didnt work. the bathroom was filthy. the stairway smells horrible along with the dirty elevators you have to take in order to go to the pool. so we stayed there for 4 hrs because we already payed for the night but when we woke up we left. never will i stay there or even mention it to any friends as a option.
reviews.title: disgusting!!!!

reviews.text: let me just start by saying we were only there for one night which is just as well as we would not have stayed any longer. we were just doing an overnight stop in miami as a group tour and this was the hotel that was booked for us. lets just start at the door and work our way in . greeted by two buckets catching water on the frount desk and a large bin collecting water by the lifts . one of the 2 main lifts broken and since a bus load of us arrived together we decided to use the stairs oh my god the smell was terrible it was a mixture of damp and urine lets just say if there was a fire (god forbid) that would be the only way you would get me down those stairs again . the room was terrible old dirty and the air con in our kids room was not working . the shower was good , good pressure on the water enough towels and soaps etc . now the really good thing about this hotel and the only reason it has one is that it is on the beach and oh my god what a beach it is . we spent the whole time there swiming and playing . there were plenty more hotels in this area and i would never stay here again .we traveled as a family and would not advise it as a holiday hotel . l think this hotel would not meet and health or saftey requirements in ireland and would be closed it made faulty towers look like a 5 star hotel
reviews.title: oh my god
Dirty, uncomfortable, ashaming.
reviews.text: Dirty, uncomfortable, ashaming. I certainly do not recomend this hotel to people who like to sleep in clean beds and with clean bathrooms.

I recently visited South Beach for what I planned to be a vacation, yet turned out to be an absoloute NIGHTMARE. From the minute I arrived at the hotel I was scared for my safety as well as in shock of the appearance of the hotel. There were no towels, toilet paper, or hot water. Needless to say, the entire hotel smells of mold and mildew. I would never stay at this hotel again. I BEGGED for a refund and the manager stated, "IT"S NOT MY PROBLEM THAT YOU ARE NOT HAPPY." Out of all the years of staying at hotels, I have never in my life seen such a poor facility and level of customer service. While staying in the hotel I learned on the second day that two doors had been kicked in and a female was raped. The hotel is a nightmare and in fact you couldn't pay me to stay there ever again. I advised the management to update their pictures online because I have no idea where they got their pictures from. The pictures are not of the actual hotel. DO NOT STAY HERE!
reviews.title: MORTIFYING

reviews.text: Booked this hotel for about $85 per night. Got a room with two full beds, enough to sleep 4 who don't care about being paired up. In our case, two of us, one per bed were the occupants. We taxied down about 10 blocks south, crossed over to Ocean, and walked back while people watching, and checking out the expensive cars. Heck, we shared three appetizers and had four cocktails each and paid way more than we did for the room.
reviews.title: DIngy bargain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was dark and could have done with a good clean. Decor old and obviously hadn't been updated for some tme. Corridor and lift like something out of a bad movie - couldn't wait to get out and about. Poolside disgusting, chairs broken and generally in need of repair, staff weren't that friendly either. Just AVOID.
reviews.title: Absolutely terrible!

reviews.text: Whatever you do...DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!! This hotel is so unclean I don't know how it can pass health inspections. My mother woke the the next morning with bug bites all over her. There was mold growing on half the walls and all the linens and towels were dirty and full of hair. We asked for new clean ones and never did recieve them. We couldn't even see in our mirror or out our window because it was so dirty.The Front desk women was so rude and unfriendly. She was just making stuff up as she went and pretended she couldn't speak english. We caught her in so many lies. They charge you for everything extra. We got talking to different guests staying at the hotel and found out we were all charged different prices for everything. This hotel is so shady. It may be a cheap stay, but not worth it. DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!
reviews.title: DISGUSTING!!!!!!!!! DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After reading some of your reviews, I was dreading my stay and had thought of cancelling my trip altogether. The hotel was rated 3 star on my online travel agent so I was appalled by the negative reviews. Anyway, we spent 6 nights in room 708 without any problems. Everything was clean and service was impeccable with bed and bath linen clean and changed regularly. The only annoyance was being directly on Collins Ave which can be noisy on weekends. Ask for a room not looking directly onto the avenue. The situation of the hotel is perfect with 2 large 24hr convenience stores nearby. Got a great online flight/hotel deal so I'm wishing others the same.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent 2 nights there. I will just mention some facts:
reviews.title: Dreadful experience!!

reviews.text: 1. Check in at 5 pm because rooms were not ready.
reviews.title: could not wait to leave

reviews.text: This by far was the worst hotel i've ever stayed in on south beach. I mean i've comlpained about some hotels before, but this dump took the cake. The staff does not comply to your necessary needs and the hotel needs a major makeover. I would'nt even recommend a bum look for shelter there in the pouring rain!
reviews.title: Better off sleeping on the beach

likes.disliked: — everything else but the walkway to the pool

reviews.text: After reading the reviews on this website - I was literally dreading staying here. On arrival I was pleasently surprised, the rooms were spacious and very clean.
reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews!!

reviews.text: The maids came in every day cleaned and gave us fresh towels, as for toliteries I took my own. The location is fantastic, pool area was quiet and clean.
reviews.title: belive the reviews its a tip

reviews.text: Thank god I never saw any cockroaches!! I am extremely fussy about where I stay and I have to say I would return again. At the end of the day its not The Ritz but I didnt pay the ritz prices.
reviews.title: Worst hotel i've ever stayed in!

reviews.text: View from the hotel room wasnt great but I didnt go to Miami to sit in my hotel room.
reviews.title: Needs a face lift

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is excellent - right on the water. It is old, and in some disrepair, but clean so we didn't really mind. However, parking is a nightmare. There is valet parking - for about 8 cars! You cannot make arrangements in advance - you have to get lucky, which we were, thanks to Ole, the bellman. If you cannot park on the grounds, you have to either park on the street or in a public parking garage a few blocks away. I'm sure either of those would have been awful.
reviews.title: What valet parking?

reviews.text: The only other issue for us was the loudness of the music at the pool - too loud to enjoy. Fortunately the beach is right there, and far enough away to not have the music be an issue. Rental of beach chairs, etc, is expensive, but we were fine with a mat and towels we brought.
reviews.title: GROSS

reviews.text: Worth the stay for the price and because we lucked out with the parking! But probably not someplace we'll stay again.
reviews.title: Cockroach in the room!!!!!!

likes.liked: — NOTHING: Facilities are so bad, not clean, staff is not professional.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Disgusting. The web site is deceiving. We checked in and checked right out. Couldn't fatham climbing into that disgusting bed in the disgusting room. We were there for all of 30 minutes and my nose was burning from the stink in the air. GROSS GROSS GROSS.
reviews.title: It's was perfect for us

reviews.text: ALSO, the front desk staff couldnt have cared less....another guest asked where the police were cause he had called 911 for some reason or another....and finally, some random strange old man wandered in off the street and the front desk manager called him by his first name!!! What kind of establishment lets random weirdos walk in off the street and hang out???
reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised
